sub_title: C-level executive with 15+ years general management experience and 30+ years experience in Fortune-500 / FTSE-100, SMB and PE FMCG companies | Track record of delivering above industry average results
summary:
Senior executive with 25+ years experience in Board of Directors, CEO, Managing Director, Marketing, Sales and Operations related roles in both Fortune-500 / FTSE-100 (i.e. Kraft Foods, The Coca-Cola Company, Reckitt Benckiser), SMB (Wessanen/Ecotone) and PE (HG International) FMCG companies.. 

Strong track record of delivering results above industry average. Self motivated, high energy and drive, curious and enthusiastic. Proven track record of visioning and implementing strategy and successfully leading innovation and change in high demanding international organizations. Consumer and customer focused, strategic and tactical, creative and strong problem solving abilities with an entrepreneurial hands-on attitude. Very committed and accountable to get to business targets, continuous strive to create value and improve returns and able to inspire, engage and motivate people to get to the desired outcome.

Skills: Business & Portfolio Strategy; General Management; P&L & NWC Management; Brand Marketing; Digital Marketing; Innovation & New Product Development; Customer Management; E-commerce; Mergers & Acquisitions; Human Resource Management; Culture Management; ESG Management.
